title: BrainPop
tagline: Feeding your brain is as important as feeding your body!
author: by Peter Davies
description: Brain-challenging quizzes, puzzles, and educational games to reinforce programming and computer science concepts.

quizzes.title: #1: Scrambled Words in C Language
quizzes.description: Answer should be in CAPITAL letters only

quizzes.description: Answer should be in CAPITAL letters only

quizzes.title: #5: Visual puzzles in Computer Programming Languages
quizzes.description: Read the instructions before answering – Use only UPPERCASE or lowercase. Don't Capitalise Each Word

quizzes.title: #6: Coding Puzzles in C Language
quizzes.description: Fill the Blanks in the Coding. Each one of us will follow different methods to get same output. If you have different answer than what is provided, mail us. Try in Online C Compiler Website: https://www.onlinegdb.com/online_c_compiler

quizzes.title: #7: C Instructions
quizzes.description: Point out errors, Evaluate the expression, True/False, Fill in the blanks
